vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for overhead and automatic commercial door repair, maintenance, parts, and labor for citywide use - DH Pace Company, Inc. dba DH Pace Door Services, lowest responsible bidder of three - Estimated amount of $4,471,734.93 - Financing:  General Fund ($2,238,434.93), Airport Revenue Fund ($500,00.00), Capital Construction Fund ($850,000.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($795,900.00), Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($54,100.00), and Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds ($33,300.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for overhead and automatic commercial door repair, maintenance, parts, and labor for citywide use - DH Pace Company, Inc. dba DH Pace Door Services, lowest responsible bidder of three - Estimated amount of $4,471,734.93 - Financing:  General Fund ($2,238,434.93), Airport Revenue Fund ($500,00.00), Capital Construction Fund ($850,000.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($795,900.00), Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($54,100.00), and Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds ($33,300.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
